name: The Legend of Shiba Inu
description:
The Legend Of Shiba Inu

This is a team collaboration project and is developed under KDU games

Samurai Culture experience, interesting puzzles are waiting for you, Samurai versus Mongolians.

Credits : Wong Chi Wei, Nikkolai Ulyanov, Azahar Luk, Khoo Jun Hui, Lum Wai Hoeh, Michael Beh, Melvern Usman
